q5.pos_def: Clear original purpose, high ethical alignment, selfless intent. 初衷, 良知, 正當性, 利他.
q5.neg_def: Lost purpose, selfish intent, unethical behavior, chaos. 私心, 惡意, 混亂, 失序.

q4.pos_def: Compliance with regulations, clear timing, legal approval. 合法, 合規, 時機正確, 制度支持.
q4.neg_def: Illegal, violation of rules, bad timing, banned. 非法, 違規, 時機錯誤, 違禁.

q3.pos_def: Clear logic, stable psychology, strategic wisdom. 邏輯清晰, 冷靜, 智慧, 策略明確.
q3.neg_def: Emotional instability, panic, logical fallacy, confusion. 恐慌, 混亂, 邏輯錯誤, 焦慮.

q2.pos_def: Strong leadership, capable team, high credibility, synergy. 領導力, 強大團隊, 信任, 執行力, 默契.
q2.neg_def: Weak leadership, no team, distrust, laziness. 團隊渙散, 無能, 不信任, 懶惰.

q1.pos_def: Abundant capital, sufficient budget, wealthy, hardware ready. 資金充足, 有錢, 預算夠, 資源豐富.
q1.neg_def: No money, bankruptcy, poverty, budget cut, deficit. 沒錢, 破產, 預算被砍, 貧窮, 負債.

q0.pos_def: Feasible hardware implementation, physically possible, realistic. 技術可行, 物理可行, 健康, 實踐.
q0.neg_def: Physically impossible, fantasy, hardware limitation, unreal. 不可能, 幻想, 技術瓶頸, 過勞.
